item.title: Girdwood Travel Guide (Southcentral Alaska/Alaska/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Plan your trip to Girdwood, Alaska with our ultimate travel guide. Explore the best things to do, where to stay, places to visit, hikes, and more.

item.description: Discover the natural attractions, things to do, and cultural experiences in Saugatuck. From must-visit landmarks, local cuisine, accommodations, to transportations, this comprehensive guide has everything you need to know before planning your trip.

item.title: Ludwigsfelde Travel Guide (Brandenburg/Germany/Central Europe/Europe)
item.description: Everything you need to know to plan a trip to Ludwigsfelde, Germany – from top attractions and outdoor activities to local culture, food, and transportation options.

item.title: Jinotega Travel Guide (Northern Highlands/Nicaragua/Central America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, things to do, and tips for traveling to Jinotega, Nicaragua, in Central America. From hiking trails to cultural attractions, find everything you need for a memorable trip.

item.description: Discover all the best places to visit, things to do, and where to eat and stay in Port aux Basques, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada.

item.title: Médanos de Coro National Park Travel Guide (Falcón/Northwest/Venezuela/South America)
item.description: Discover the natural and cultural wonders of Médanos de Coro National Park in Venezuela with our detailed travel guide, featuring outdoor adventures, must-visit attractions, local cuisine and more.

item.title: Islas Paridas Travel Guide (Pacific West/Panama/Central America/North America)
item.description: Discover Islas Paridas in Panama. Find tips on the best hikes, scenic views, local foods, and souvenirs to bring home.

item.title: Samar Province Travel Guide (Samar Island/Visayas/Philippines/Southeast Asia/Asia)
item.description: Discover the must-see attractions, hiking and biking routes, best things to do, food and drink scene, where to stay, culture and customs, and more in Samar Province, Philippines.
